title: It's a new world!
creator_credit: Venture Film Services and Amateur Swimming Association
brief_description: Shows the advantages of swimming for the physically disabled, focusing extensively on the methods of holding handicapped children in water to build water-confidence and compensate for the lack of movement on land. Looks at ways children with disabilities have overcome their handicaps and some of the achievements of the disabled in their sport.
